title: Chicken en papillote with carrots and courgettes
ingredients: ['4 skinless, boneless chicken breasts, 675g (1½ lb) in total', '115g (4oz) mushrooms, sliced', '2 carrots, cut into 4cm (1½in) matchsticks', '2 courgettes, cut into 4cm (1½in) matchsticks', '2 tbsp olive oil', '1 tbsp chopped basil', '2 tbsp lemon juice', 'pepper to taste']
